any-database
============

|GitHub stars|

   Run any database

Please ★ this repo if you found it useful ★ ★ ★

Features
--------

-  Supports MySQL
-  Supports MariaDB
-  Supports Postgres
-  Supports MongoDB

Installation
------------

.. code:: sh

   pip3 install anydb

Dependencies
------------

-  `Python 3 <https://www.python.org>`__
-  `Docker <https://www.docker.com>`__

Usage
-----

`Contribute <https://github.com/codejamninja/any-database/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md>`__
usage docs

-------

a screenshot
